titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the A. Wilhelm letterbook, 1880-1882

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Letterbook of A. Wilhelm, a Pennsylvania attorney. Includes letters related to real estate holdings in the vicinity of Cornwall and Lebanon, Pennsylvania of Mrs. Anne C. Alden of Cornwall, for whom Wilhelm was attorney, as well as letters concerning building and repairs, banking, and legal services. Includes letters to McKim, Mead & White, architects, of New York City

prefercite.p: A. Wilhelm letterbook, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
